article_text:
Thank you for reading 10 free articles on our site. You can come back at the end of your 30-day period for another 10 free articles, or you can purchase a subscription at this time and continue to enjoy valuable local news and information. If you need help, please contact our office at 317-398-6631. You need an online service to view this article in its entirety.

Have an online subscription? Login Now Need an online subscription? Already a Print Subscriber?

Current print subscribers 1 Free Print Subscriber Access If you are a print subscriber you can access the online site using your phone number. If you have any issues please call us at (317) 398-6631

Need an account? Create one now.

og.description: KNIGHTSTOWN —Ted Cruz took to the stage Tuesday at the Historic Hoosier Gym, which probably hadn’t seen a crowd that size since the Hickory Huskers faced off against the Terhune Tigers of movie fame.
og.title: Cruz-in at Knightstown

article_metadata.description: KNIGHTSTOWN —Ted Cruz took to the stage Tuesday at the Historic Hoosier Gym, which probably hadn’t seen a crowd that size since the Hickory Huskers faced off against the Terhune Tigers of movie fame.
